name: Force (Dennis Franke, BackFisch)
description:
Force is a 2,5d Coop Puzzle Plattfomer in which 2 Players have to work together to solve Puzzles. Each Player has their own Level but they can interact in many ways. This Game also features a Level Editor so you can build your own level. 

-Games requires Gamepads with Analog Triggers(Ex. Xbox One Controllers, PS4 Controllers etc.)

Please let us know about any Bugs you encounter or any thing about the game that we could improve
